greeting.text: Welcome to OpenClaw World! I'm Alex, your friendly receptionist. How can I help you today?

directions-meeting.text: The meeting center is just south of here! Look for the big glass doors with the conference table logo. Can't miss it!

options.text: Thanks! Anything else I should know?

meeting-tips.text: Riley the Event Host is usually there if you need help with presentations. And don't forget to check the schedule board for upcoming events!

directions-it.text: IT Help is in the office area to the east. Look for Taylor at the help desk - they're the one surrounded by monitors and energy drinks!

it-warning.text: Oh, and fair warning - they might ask if you've tried turning it off and on again. It's kind of their thing!

options.text: Ha! I'll keep that in mind.

directions-cafe.text: Ah, looking for caffeine! Head to the lounge-cafe in the southeast corner. Jamie makes the best coffee in the building - just don't ask for decaf, they might cry.

farewell.text: Feel free to explore! If you need anything else, I'll be right here at the front desk. Have a wonderful day!
